description: From Middle English heightenen, hyghtenen, equivalent to height +‎ -en (verbal suffix).

verbs.description: heighten (third-person singular simple present heightens, present participle heightening, simple past and past participle heightened)

entries.meaning: To make high; to raise higher; to elevate.
To advance, increase, augment, make larger, more intense, stronger etc.
examples: to heighten a flavor or a tint
“That’s heightened by the impact of climate change,” she added.
